item.title: Create a blog via Jekyll and post to Github
item.description: The logo of Jekyll1Table of Contents Install Jekyll Publish blog to Github Install Jekyll Jekyll is a static website generation framework written in Ruby language. The following is the official website introduction. Jekyll is a static site generator. You give it text written in your favorite markup language and it uses layouts to create a static website. You can tweak how you want the site URLs to look, what data gets displayed on the site, and more.
